This program runs the problem from class.

```{r}
library("lpSolveAPI")
x <- read.lp("P3_1.lp")
x
```
```{r}
solve(x)
get.objective(x)
```
```{r}
get.variables(x)
```

Get constraints
```{r}
get.constraints(x)
```

Get dual solution
```{r}
get.dual.solution(x)
get.sensitivity.rhs(x)
```
